title: Ingested Lamb Bone Presented as Right Iliac Fossa Pain Mimicking Acute Appendicitis
details: SFA Khan, Z Hashmi, M Asad, S Waheed - Journal of Primary Care Specialties, 2025
abstract: Abdominal pain is a frequent presentation encountered by the primary care physician. Acute appendicitis accounts for a small but significant proportion of abdominal pain cases seen. Among the known etiologies mimicking appendicitis …
